snippet.title: Meg's Monster Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Available for Pre-order on Xbox, Nintendo Switch, and Steam.
Website: https://odencat.com/bakemono/

You’re the most invincible creature in the land, but if she cries, the whole world dies! Guide Roy and Meg on an epic journey spanning the monster world as you try to find the lost girl’s mother. Pummel foes in unique turn-based combat where you must dish out damage while also taking care of who’s behind you. Meet a cast of zany characters as you find a way to return Meg back to her home.
